content: learn how to crochet a simple granny stitch washcloth with my free pattern and step-by-step tutorial perfect for beginners this week i m sharing a free pattern for a beautiful granny stitch washcloth that s perfect for beginners the granny stitch is a crochet classic that s easy to learn and creates a lovely texture with both a photo and video tutorial included you ll have all the help you need to complete this quick project in no time give it a try and don t forget to share your finished work with me washcloth of the month club pattern for september sign-up for a reminder with the washcloth patterns are available each month in 2024 monthly email reminder 1 > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until september 9 > 2024 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on september 9th and it > will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on september 8 2024 at 8 00 pm est new york time 20 00 > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/47a92529ba
